* Based on object mass and friction coefficient, grasp should initially set the contact force to 32.7 Newtons.
* If the gripper slips, this grasp should increase the output force by 0.01 Newtons.
* This grasp sets the force to 10.0, which is lower than the default initial contact force because of the need to avoid injury and maintain safe manipulation for a human wrist.
[end of description]
